Articles.Content:
Hi there, just a quick question: I just unlocked some mining drills and fluorite seems to have the highest value but I can't seem to find any containers that will store it. Anyone know? (I believe this is from the interstellar mod. thanks!

EDIT: found a container that holds it way up the tech tree (research: specialized fuel storage), might as well keep this post up. it's called 'PART: IFS Cargo Container'. 

Edited May 13, 2017 by Red Iron Crown
Let's keep it on topic, please.
